thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us
thread.title: Teresa Turman
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Teresa Turman

author: Teresa Turman
title: Teresa Turman
text: I was a returning customer because I got my living room furniture and my bed set from here. So when it was time to get my daughters upgrade I thought of them however her grandparents had gotten her a bed. I'm still waiting for my refund. This was in December and it's February hence 2 months after! Not to mention the workers were smoking Marijuana in the garage when I came to talk to someone about my return. Shop at own risk people.
